display_long_description:
Between sleep and fear, you can’t move, only blink.

SleepWatch is a psychological VR horror experience inspired by real sleep paralysis. You are trapped in bed, suspended between dreaming and waking, while something lurks in your room. You can’t run. You can’t scream. You can only close your eyes to hide or stare back to survive.

Now featuring multiplayer.

One player becomes the Sleeper, helpless and immobile, fighting to stay awake. Another becomes the Observer, watching from the shadows triggering sounds, disturbances, and unseen horrors to push the Sleeper closer to panic. Every session becomes unpredictable. Every reaction is real.

Every second counts.
Survive as long as you can and climb the global leaderboard of the Longest Awake.

Features:
- Psychological VR horror inspired by real sleep paralysis

- Singleplayer and multiplayer modes (Sleeper & Observer)

- Minimal controls: only your gaze and blinks

- Randomized events, apparitions, and tense sound design

- A slow-burn horror where silence (and another player) is your greatest threat

How long can you stay awake before the nightmare takes you?
